hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying." By Allah! I ask for forgiveness from Allah and turn to Him in repentance more than seventy times a day

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِغْفَارِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم فِي الْيَوْمِ وَاللَّيْلَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Seeking Allah's forgiveness by daytime and at night
